dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 250 IH: To amend the Antiquities Act of 1906 to place additional requirements on the establishment of national monuments under that Act, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Chaffetz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Antiquities Act of 1906 to place additional requirements on the establishment of national monuments under that Act, and for other purposes.

section.header: Requirement for establishment of national monument
section.text: Section 2 of the Act of June 8, 1906 (commonly known as the Antiquities Act of 1906; 16 U.S.C. 431) is amended by striking , in his discretion, to declare by public proclamation and inserting to declare, subject to approval by an Act of Congress,.
